fields.title: Answer:
fields.value:
Yearn.finance is a DeFi yield aggregator that runs on the Ethereum blockchain.

Yield aggregation refers to investing using the most current optimal strategy to maximize returns. The optimal strategy is constantly changing. 

Yearn is the easiest way for consumers to earn interest and maximize their returns on their asset (DAI, ETH, BTC) while also saving money on transaction fees and time spent researching.

In some ways this makes Yearn similar to the roboadvisor products offered by Vanguard, Wealthfront and Betterment.

Yearn offers a suite of yield aggregation products:
- Earn
- Vaults
- Yinsurance
- Zap
